Uses of Package
API.ADK

  • Classes in API.ADK used by API.ADK 
    Class and Description
    API_ADK
    This class implements all the functionalities of the ADK and should be called by an application that wants to connect and communicate with a CAN device.
    API_ADK.Device
    Subclass Device.
    API_ADK.Device.Controller
    Subclass Controller.
    API_ADK.Device.MessageChannel
    Subclass MessageChannel.
    AutostartStatus
    Enum of the Autostart status.
    BusCouplingStatus
    Enum of the Bus coupling status.
    CANblueConfiguration
    Structure for the CANblue configuration.
    CANInfo
    Structure for the CAN controller status and also the error flags (state, overruns, Warning Level or BUS OFF).
    ConnectionStatus
    Enum of the Instance status.
    ConstantList
    Contain list of constants used by the API_ADK and Driver classes.
    ControllerStatus
    Enum of the Controller status.
    DetectionMethod
    Enum of the Detection method status.
    DeviceInformation
    Structure for the Device information, such as firmware version, protocol version, and hardware number.
    DeviceList
    List of all supported devices and its status.
    DeviceOnlyList
    List of Device (Name, MAC Address, and Detection status only).
    DeviceType
    Enum of the Supported device type.
    Driver
    CANBlue Implementation of the Driver Class.
    Driver.CANDevice
    Subclass CANDevice.
    Driver.CANDevice.CANController
    Subclass CANController.
    Driver.CANDevice.CANMessage
    Subclass CANMessage.
    Driver.CANDevice.ReceiveData
    The receive thread for receiving all Bluetooth data.
    Driver.CANDevice.TransmitBulkMessage
    The transmit thread for transmitting bulk CAN message.
    ErrorBuffer
    Structure for the Error Flag.
    FilterList
    Structure for the Filter list.
    FilterStatus
    Enum of the Filter status.
    LatencyInformation
    Structure for the Latency information.
    MACScanDeviceList
    Structure for the MACScan response.
    MessageStructure
    Structure of the Message (Frame format, Message ID, Frame type, Data, Data length, Timestamp).
    ReceiveBuffer
    The Receive Message buffer.
    ResponseBuffer
    The Response buffer used to communicate between the receive thread and the CANDevice class.
    ReturnCode
    Enum of all return codes.
